amendment.description: To ensure the enactment of a medicare prescription drug benefit.

action.text: Amendment SA 614 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 614 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 56. Record Vote Number: 159.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 614.
Amendment SA 614 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S6214-6216; text: CR S6214) To ensure the enactment of a medicare prescription drug benefit.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 614 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 56. Record Vote Number: 159.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 614 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
